content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available and not currently processing before inserting items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when they are available in the furnace to avoid unnecessary attempts.

### Errors with inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary materials before attempting to insert or extract items.
